json_to_edit.voice_over: Once upon a time, in a world where reality and fantasy collided...
json_to_edit.description: Fairy tale characters appear in a modern city, causing chaos and confusion.
json_to_edit.weather: Sunny with magical sparkles in the air
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic noise, magical tinkling, gasps of surprise
json_to_edit.name: Fairy Tale Invasion
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Fairy tale characters suddenly appear in a bustling city, interacting with shocked residents.

qa.action: A busy city street where fairy tale characters suddenly appear in puffs of glittery smoke.

hf.action: Alice from Wonderland looking confused as she stands in the middle of a crosswalk, cars swerving around her.

tr.action: The Big Bad Wolf's face as he grins mischievously, eyeing a hot dog stand.

xc.action: Officer Johnson scratching his head in disbelief as he watches Cinderella's pumpkin carriage roll down the street.

ka.action: Fairy tale characters causing havoc: giants stepping over cars, flying carpets weaving through traffic.

fn.action: A businessman's briefcase transforming into a treasure chest, spilling gold coins onto the sidewalk.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, but don't change anything else. The new shots should provide additional context or detail to the scene.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot to provide additional context or detail to the scene. this will double the number of shots from 6 to 12. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to include the new shots, and add new shot descriptions that complement and enhance the existing ones. the new shots will be creative and provide more depth to the scene while maintaining the overall theme and atmosphere.
